alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cattaraugus and southwestern Allegany Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bradford, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Olean, Wellsville, Allegany State Park, Allegany, Belfast, Cuba, St. Bonaventure, Weston Mills, Houghton, Caneadea, Hinsdale, Friendship, Scio, Carrollton, Bolivar, Portville, Belmont, Angelica, Ischua and Alma. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 23 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for western New York.
